metadata.synopsis: Toobin provides some information on the Zombie area of the lab floor of the Foundry. He's passing comment on things as him and the player run past them
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Aopen ReCon and use "oe low_Foundry_FundangoFollower"turn on peace modeGo to-1937; 0; 443observe the AD play

1.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
1.text: I smell death and decay. We're near cadaver preparation, aren't we?

0.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
0.text: Poor bastards are shipped in from all over the Realms. Most come from a fellow called Balthazar by way of Moonrise Towers.
